description: This file defines the 'FeedScreen' widget for a Flutter app, rendering the main story discovery interface. It manages state, handles user interactions like liking/disliking stories, and provides UI elements such as a gradient background, animated story cards, and a button to post new stories.

classes.name: FeedScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying the story feed with gradient background, animated story card transitions, and a floating action button for posting stories.

classes.name: _FeedScreenState
classes.description: State class handling the dynamic behavior of FeedScreen, including initialization, story display logic, and user interactions.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: A stateless widget showing an empty state message with a reshuffle button when no stories are available.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the FeedScreen widget.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes the story feed provider if not already initialized.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the feed screen, including decorations, story display, and action buttons.

methods.name: _EmptyState
methods.description: Build method for the empty state widget, showing a message and reshuffle button.
